医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
肉碱转运蛋白如何促进生殖健康研究揭示了肉碱转运蛋白通过调节能量代谢和保护生殖细胞免受氧化应激来维持生育能力的关键作用。它提出了通过补充肉碱和靶向治疗治疗不孕症的新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/How-carnitine-transporters-boost-reproductive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/How-carnitine-transporters-boost-reproductive-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=255f5e17-bb14-4956-ad95-4f8177b05a24 Sun, 06 Oct 2024 22:44:00 -0400 How carnitine transporters boost reproductive health
新研究显示，友谊可以提高单身新兴成年人的幸福感研究人员利用潜在特征分析，确定了 18-24 岁单身新兴成年人的五种不同的幸福特征，其中友谊满意度成为一个关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Friendship-drives-happiness-in-single-emerging-adults-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Friendship-drives-happiness-in-single-emerging-adults-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1017616-daaf-4ceb-ab1e-b6c59a271550 Sun, 06 Oct 2024 22:01:00 -0400 Friendship drives happiness in single emerging adults, new study reveals
精神分裂症相关幻觉与运动感觉信号中断有关研究人员发现，精神分裂症患者的伴随放电（CD）和噪音传出拷贝（EC）受损会扰乱自我监控，导致幻听。计算模型揭示了这些运动到感觉功能障碍如何导致幻觉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Schizophrenia-lated-hallucinations-linked-to-disrupted-motor-sensory-signals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Schizophrenia-lated-hallucinations-linked-to-disrupted-motor-sensory-signals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8084c2e3-caf2-4b25-98f7-02cd6843aa49 Sun, 06 Oct 2024 21:42:00 -0400 Schizophrenia-related hallucinations linked to disrupted motor-sensory signals
科技突破有效减少了课堂上手机的使用技术中断减少了大学课堂上手机的使用，但对学习成绩的影响好坏参半，表明需要进一步调查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Tech-breaks-efficiently-reduce-cell-phone-use-in-classrooms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Tech-breaks-efficiently-reduce-cell-phone-use-in-classrooms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df454067-9299-4f55-9927-17abedb9dc12 Sun, 06 Oct 2024 21:30:00 -0400 Tech breaks effectively reduce cell phone use in classrooms
研究表明流感疫苗对儿童非常有效，但也强调了某些亚型的挑战研究发现，流感疫苗接种对于预防儿童感染和住院治疗非常有效，但由于样本量较小，针对 H3N2 等某些亚型的疗效仍然有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Study-reveals-high-efficiency-of-flu-vaccines-in-children-but-highlights-challenges-with-certain-subtypes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Study-reveals-high-efficiency-of-flu-vaccines-in-children-but-highlights-challenges-with-certain-subtypes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da8150b9-05f0-4beb-9859-eea74226a23b Sun, 06 Oct 2024 20:30:00 -0400 Study reveals high effectiveness of flu vaccines in children but highlights challenges with certain subtypes
公园跑步可以提高生活满意度并通过改善福祉来节省资金公园跑步可以提高生活满意度，尤其是对于最不活跃的人来说，同时通过成本效益提供显着的经济效益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Park-runs-boost-life-satisfaction-and-save-money-by-improving-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/Park-runs-boost-life-satisfaction-and-save-money-by-improving-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d320fa0-de16-4df5-a742-225b025cfe59 Sun, 06 Oct 2024 20:00:00 -0400 Park runs boost life satisfaction and save money by improving well-being
CheekAge：下一代表观遗传时钟准确预测死亡风险研究人员开发了 CheekAge，一种基于口腔细胞的表观遗传时钟，发现它可以非常准确地预测死亡风险。这项研究验证了 CheekAge 是一种可靠的衰老生物标志物，其性能优于第一代时钟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/CheekAge-Next-gen-epigenic-clock-accurately-predicts-mortality-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241006/CheekAge-Next-gen-epigenic-clock-accurately-predicts-mortality-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5819d28-428b-4681-aa5e-85c71dbe81aa Sun, 06 Oct 2024 19:38:00 -0400 CheekAge: Next-gen epigenetic clock accurately predicts mortality risk
研究揭示受伤青少年物质使用筛查存在偏差加州大学洛杉矶分校和洛杉矶儿童医院的研究人员领导的一项研究表明，即使考虑到受伤​​的严重程度，在儿科创伤中心接受治疗的边缘群体受伤青少年也比白人青少年更有可能接受药物和酒精检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Study-reveals-bias-in-substance-use-screening-for-injured-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Study-reveals-bias-in-substance-use-screening-for-injured-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42bda95b-bbbf-447e-80de-cfc01e3e7910 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 23:25:00 -0400 Study reveals bias in substance use screening for injured adolescents
研究人员揭示了 CDK12 改变如何驱动前列腺癌发展的机制当密歇根大学罗格尔癌症中心的研究人员首次发现一种新的侵袭性前列腺癌亚型时，他们知道需要了解这种基因改变如何导致癌症以及如何针对其进行治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Researchers-reveal-mechanisms-of-how-CDK12-alterations-drive-prostate-cancer-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Researchers-reveal-mechanisms-of-how-CDK12-alterations-drive-prostate-cancer-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8d0ca5a-a45c-44df-a496-a8853dc67925 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 23:15:00 -0400 Researchers reveal mechanisms of how CDK12 alterations drive prostate cancer development
为定义益生元建立了新框架益生元的概念（定义为被宿主微生物选择性利用并具有健康益处的底物）在近 30 年前被科学界引入。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/New-framework-builted-for-defining-prebiotics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/New-framework-builted-for-defining-prebiotics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d9719d6-1883-45b4-a596-0e3e9e59a8e3 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 23:06:00 -0400 New framework established for defining prebiotics
